column4: hi... i installed ubuntu over an extremely virus-ridden windows-xp on my parents' laptop, but they hate it, so now i need to reinstall xp.... but when i put the xp disc in, ubuntu is recognising it only as a blank disc, but on MY laptop with ubuntu, it recognises the disc just fine... why is the other ubuntu not able to recognise the windows disc?
i tried that already, but i will try again
no it just goes to ubuntu, i even changed it in bios to boot first from the cd
